title: Final Debt
description: The Last Book in the New York Times Bestselling Dark Romance Series. Where love tries to triumph and darkness continues to reign....“I’m in love with her, but it might not be enough to stop her from becoming the latest victim of the Debt Inheritance. I know who I am now. I know what I must do. We will be together—I just hope it’s on Earth rather than in heaven.”It all comes down to this. Love versus life. Debts versus death. Who will win? Sixth Book in the New York Times Bestselling Indebted Series.All Books Are Full Length of 300 Pages or More.Debt Inheritance (Indebted #1) Available NowFirst Debt (Indebted #2) Available NowSecond Debt (Indebted #3) Available NowThird Debt (Indebted #4) Available NowFourth Debt (Indebted #5) Available NowFinal Debt Coming)Release Date Alerts: http://eepurl.com/120b5
author: Pepper Winters
